Package edu.unomaha.pkischeduler.ui

Class RoomView

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
com.vaadin.flow.component.applayout.AppLayout
edu.unomaha.pkischeduler.ui.RoomView
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.vaadin.flow.component.AttachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.DetachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasElement, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasStyle, com.vaadin.flow.router.RouterLayout, Serializable
@Route("room") public class RoomView extends com.vaadin.flow.component.applayout.AppLayout
RoomView creates the UI for the Room x Room schedule view. This UI is designed to allow the user to view the courses that are assigned to any given room. Uses an accordion to display information.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getRoomContent

      private com.vaadin.flow.component.Component getRoomContent()
      This function compiles a short description of the page purpose and the accordion component into a vertical layout.
      Returns:
      A vertical layout component containing the accordion and a label.

    • updateCourseList

      private void updateCourseList()
      This function iterates through each room and each course to determine which courses are associated with a given room. At each iteration the room object gets an updated list of courses that are assigned to it. This function allows the accordion to display the courses that are assigned to any given room.

    • configureAccordion

      private void configureAccordion()
      This function creates the accordion component and populates the component with the database objects.

    • getTabs

      private com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.HorizontalLayout getTabs()
      This function provides the navigation tabs in a horizontal layout that is added to the navigation bar.
      Returns:
      A horizontal layout containing the navigation tabs.
